mapper.select: select a.id, a.name, IF(sum(c.addDiagnosis) is NULL, 0, sum(c.addDiagnosis)) as addDiagnosis, IF(sum(c.cure) is NULL, 0, sum(c.cure)) as cure, IF(sum(c.die) is NULL, 0, sum(c.die)) as die from city a, city b, yiqing c where a.pId = 0 and a.id = b.pId and c.cId = b.id group by a.id;

select b.id, b.name, IF(sum(c.addDiagnosis) is NULL, 0, sum(c.addDiagnosis)) as addDiagnosis, IF(sum(c.cure) is NULL, 0, sum(c.cure)) as cure, IF(sum(c.die) is NULL, 0, sum(c.die)) as die from city a, city b, yiqing c where a.id = #{id} and a.id = b.pId and c.cId = b.id group by b.id;
